alert.note: Alert for Kanabec (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 27 at 3:57PM CDT until July 27 at 4:30PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: The National Weather Service in the Twin Cities has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Kanabec County in east central Minnesota... * Until 430 PM CDT. * At 357 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles east of Isle, or 18 miles northwest of Hinckley, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Kanabec County, including the following locations... Snake River State Forest and Warman. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
